duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform technical tests and experiments for engineering in the wafer fabrication area
Test new products and provide technical assistance to process development and engineering personnel
Interface and communicate with engineering and manufacturing groups across the fab
Provide process and product support to the organization and address production concerns
Identify, multi-task, and resolve multiple priority issues quickly and efficiently
Learn and understand process flow quickly and support the engineering organization as needed
Collaborate effectively in a team environment
Demonstrate excellent verbal and written communications skills
Perform other designated tasks as assigned by management
Work comfortably in a cleanroom environment
Proficient with MS Office, Word, and Excel

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma (AA degree or 4 years of experience in the FAB preferred)
